Class CSVLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • miscellaneous.CSVLoader

  • public class CSVLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    CSVLoader - Loads .csv files into a 2D arraylist
    Since:
    2021-10-23
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lim Rui An, Ryan

        filePath - an absolute file path to the target csv file
        csvHasHeader - boolean to state csv file has a csv header
